specials.name: Espresso
specials.description: A strong and bold shot of pure coffee, rich in flavor and aroma.

specials.name: Cappuccino
specials.description: A classic blend of espresso, steamed milk, and frothy milk foam.

specials.name: Latte
specials.description: A smooth coffee with a generous amount of steamed milk and a light foam.

specials.name: Mocha
specials.description: A sweet and creamy mix of espresso, chocolate syrup, and steamed milk.

specials.name: Americano
specials.description: A mellow and smooth coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water.

specials.name: Flat White
specials.description: A velvety combination of espresso and micro-foamed milk, rich and smooth.

specials.name: Macchiato
specials.description: An espresso 'stained' with a small amount of frothy steamed milk.

specials.name: Affogato
specials.description: A delightful dessert coffee featuring espresso poured over vanilla ice cream.

specials.name: Irish Coffee
specials.description: A warm blend of coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and a layer of cream.

specials.name: Cold Brew
specials.description: A refreshing, smooth coffee brewed slowly with cold water over 12 hours.
